Package com.uno.server.networking

Class OrderServerImpl

java.lang.Object
com.uno.server.networking.OrderServerImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
OrderServer, Remote
public class OrderServerImpl extends Object implements OrderServer
This class implements OrderServer Interface. This server object handles sending and receiving Order objects from client and server.
